content: आप्यै {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To grow fat, stout, or full, become full, increase; आहुत्य, प्यायते सूर्यः <ls>Y. 3. 71.</ls> {@--2@} To make full, strengthen, enlarge. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (--प्याययति) {@--1@} To make fat, full, or comfortable, increase, enlarge; तेजसा तव तेजश्च विष्णुराप्याययिष्यति <ls>Mb.</ls>; सैव कांतिर्मन्मथाप्यायिता द्युतिः <ls>S. D.</ls>; वायुभिराप्यायितशरीरः <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; <ls>Me. 44</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 314.</ls> {@--2@} To gratify, regale, satisfy, please; आप्यायितो वचनामृतेन <ls>H. 1</ls>; <ls>K. 124</ls>, <ls>Mv. 1</ls>, <ls n="Mv.">2.</ls>
